snippet: American companies supplying materials to China led the decline despite a unexpectedly positive federal report on service sector growth.
abstract: Stocks decline, led by American companies supplying materials to China, after country trims its 2012 forecast for economic growth.
lead_paragraph: American companies supplying materials to China led the decline despite a unexpectedly positive federal report on service sector growth.

headline.seo: Shares Dip Again as China Cuts Its Growth Outlook
headline.main: Share Prices Dip Again as China Cuts Its Forecast
headline.print_headline: Share Prices Dip Again As China Cuts Its Forecast
